title: City Council 5/24/21
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy

In-person attendance is currently prohibited per Washington State Governor's Proclamation 20-28.15, until the COVID-19 State of Emergency is terminated or Proclamation 20-28 is rescinded by the Governor or State legislature. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and online by the Seattle Channel.

Agenda: Call to Order, Roll Call, Presentations, Approval of the Journal, Adoption of the Introduction and Referral Calendar, Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; Payment of Bills; CB 120000: Relating to Office for Civil Rights; CB 120071: Relating to commercial tenancies; CB 120065: Relating to emergency communications; Reappointment to Seattle School Traffic Safety Committee; CB 120052: Relating to City Light Department and an Interlocal Agreement with Skagit County; CB 120053: Relating  to surveillance technology implementation - Forward Looking Infrared Real-Time Video; CB 120054: Relating  to surveillance technology implementation - Situational Awareness Cameras Without Recording; CB 120055: Relating  to surveillance technology implementation - Video Recording Systems;  CB 120061: Northwest Kidney Center pedestrian tunnel; CB 120074: Relating to  Grange Insurance Association skybridge; CB 120075: Relating to BGO Plaza 600 JV LLC pedestrian tunnel; CB 120076: Relating to  IC/RCDP Seattle Hotel pedestrian tunnel; CB 120078: Relating to emergency communications;  Res 32006: Resolution related to Federal Aviation Authority (FAA) land transfer; Appointments and Reappointments.
